metadata.dc:description: To provide adequate health care with an intercultural approach is necessary for the health care personnel know the Peruvian ethnolinguistic diversity, so we present 76 ethnic groups that belong to 16 ethnolinguistic families and their geographical distribution on a map of Peru.
metadata.dc:title: Mapa etnolingüístico del Perú
[Ethnolinguistic map of Peru].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista peruana de medicina experimental y salud publica
